Desc.entry: A not-for-profit economic inclusion initiative aimed at spreading the economic benefits of the CDI high growth sector to some of the most disadvantaged communities in South Yorkshire. Also aims to add to the growth of the CDI sector by selecting and developing a strategic network of CDI focused creative enterprise centres based in priority neighbourhoods across Barnsley, Doncaster, Rotherham and Sheffield. The programme is specifically targeted at developing local infrastructure to encourage business growth, new enterprise start ups, learning opportunities and new employment as well as eventually assisting local communities with income generation through the development of sustainable capital assets. Company limited by guarantee no 3815552.
